answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!What you have is probably glove and stocking neuropathy seen in Lyme’s, metabolic disorders like diabetes, Kidney and liver dysfunction, gluten sensitivity as seen in Sprue and Celiac disease, Vit B12 and pyridoxine deficiency, generalized Vit B deficiency, alcoholic neuropathy, side effect of drugs (Epilium being among them) and in some cases due to poisoning (arsenic, lead). Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper investigations and referral.Take care!
